name: UPG
description:
A game full of frenzy, manage to complete the game in the shortest possible time going through a wide variety of short but intense levels with interesting mechanics.

TRAILER:

SCREENSHOTS:

VERSION FEATURES (Ver. 22a01):

  • One world with 20 levels
  • fixed bugs: UPGB#1, UPGB#2
  • new death point icon
  • new background
  • difficulty adjustments in levels

CONTROLS:

"A", "D", and "SPACE" to move

to play on full screen press "F11"

press "P" to go to menu.

"R" to restart the level.
